verses.roman:
tāṅra saṅge anyonye, tāṅra saṅge āna
ei-mata 'vaiṣṇava' kailā saba deśa-grāma

synonyms: tāṅra saṅge—with Him; anyonye—other; tāṅra saṅge—and with him; āna—another; ei-mata—in this way; vaiṣṇava—Vaiṣṇava; kailā—made; saba—all; deśa-grāma—villages and towns.
translation: Whoever met Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu became a Vaiṣṇava, and whoever met that Vaiṣṇava also became a Vaiṣṇava. In this way, all the towns and villages one after the other became Vaiṣṇava.
